title: People-Pleasing Deep Dive
description: Understanding the people-pleasing pattern and reclaiming your authentic self

modules.title: Practical Recovery
modules.description: Skills for saying no and being authentic

questions.question: What is often at the root of people-pleasing?
options: Fear of rejection and need for external validation

questions.question: What is a key cost of chronic people-pleasing?
options: Loss of authentic self and resentment

questions.question: What is essential for recovery from people-pleasing?
options: Learning to not care about anyone
Building self-worth independent of others' approval
